sentences.english: I'm sure we will twelve-step our way out of the difficulties.

sentences.english: The enemy was advancing. The snow was stained with blood.

sentences.english: Had he ever been in the way of learning, I think he would have drawn very well.

sentences.english: I hope there will be a promotion for you this year.

sentences.english: He also ratcheted down what victory in Afghanistan meant. Whereas the U.

sentences.english: Good mid-winter to spring has, year-end score step by step.

sentences.english: With heavy knapsacks on their backs, the explorers plodded on their way up the snow-covered mountains.

sentences.english: But he is young and his route to the top is through the CSU.
